name: Death Knight Name Generator
description: Unleash the power of the Lich King! Forge a name worthy of a Death Knight with our generator. Embrace the darkness and find a title that strikes fear into the hearts of your enemies.
introduction: So, you've embraced the chill of undeath and pledged allegiance to the Ebon Blade? Excellent choice! But a fearsome Death Knight needs a name that echoes through the frozen wastes. Our generator is here to help you craft the perfect moniker, whether you're a brooding tank, a ruthless DPS, or a chilling healer. Prepare to rise... as someone memorable!
howToUse: Marvel at the awesomeness of the names presented to you.
If you're not feeling the dark vibes, hit 'Generate' again! We've got an endless supply of names just waiting to be unleashed.
Once you find the perfect name, copy it and unleash it upon the unsuspecting world! Bonus points for dramatic pronouncements.
Remember, a great name is a terrible thing to waste. Use it wisely... or evilly. We're not judging.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my World of Warcraft Death Knight?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! These names are designed to be lore-friendly and badass enough for any Death Knight in Azeroth... or beyond!

faqs.question: Are the names generated completely random?
faqs.answer: Yes! We use a sophisticated (okay, maybe not *that* sophisticated) algorithm to combine prefixes and suffixes, ensuring a unique and suitably grim name every time.

faqs.question: Will this generator help me become a better Death Knight player?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee improved rotation skills, a truly epic name *will* boost your confidence and intimidate your opponents. So, yes, indirectly!

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button! With countless combinations, you're bound to find a name that resonates with your inner darkness. Alternatively, you can always tweak a generated name to make it your own.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other characters besides Death Knights?
faqs.answer: While they're specifically crafted for Death Knights, feel free to use them for any character that embraces the darker side of fantasy. Necromancers, warlocks, edgy rogues... the possibilities are endless!

faqs.question: Is this generator free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes! Unleash the power of undeath without spending a single gold coin. Our gift to you, champion of the Ebon Blade.
